title.value: Clinical Practice Guidelines for Palliative Care, 4th Edition Released

body.value:
Clinical Practice Guidelines for Quality Palliative Care, 4th edition, released Oct 31, 2018, create a blueprint for excellence by establishing a comprehensive foundation for gold-standard palliative care for all people living with serious illness, regardless of their diagnosis, prognosis, age or setting.

The guidelines expand on the eight domains of palliative care in the 3rd edition and include clinical and organizational strategies, screening and assessment elements, practice examples, tools and resources.

To read more and download your copy click below:

[button size="large" color="green" target="_blank" url="https://www.nationalcoalitionhpc.org/ncp/"]National Coalition for Hospice and Palliative Care[/button]

field_subtitle.value: New National Guidelines Seek to Improve Access to Palliative Care for People Living with Serious Illness
